name: 楊安石
objective: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
schedule:
1        1.1 Basic Concepts and Reviews; 1.2 Some Examples of
Viscous-Flow Phenomena
2        1.3 Description of Fluid Flows; 1.4 Types of Fluid Motion
3        2.1 Introduction; 2.2 Classification of Fundamental
equations
4        2.3 Conservation of Mass: The Equation of Continuity
5        2.4 Conservation of Momentum: The Navier-Stokes Equations
6        第一次期中考
7        2.5 The Energy Equation (First Law of Thermodynamics)
         2.6 Boundary Conditions for Viscous Heat-Conducting Flow;
         2.7 Orthogonal Coordinate Systems
8        2.8 Mathematical Character of the Basic Equations; 2.10
             Vorticity Considerations in Incompressible Viscous
             Flow;
9        2.11 Two-Dimensional Considerations: The Stream Function
10       3.1 Introduction and Classification of Solutions
11       第二次期中考
12       3.2 Couette Flows Due to Moving Surfaces
13       3.3 Poiseuille Flow through Ducts; 3.4 Unsteady Duct Flows
14       3.5 Unsteady Flows with Moving Boundaries; 3.6 Asymptotic
             Suction flows; 3.7 Wind-Driven Flows; 3.8 Similarity
             Solutions
15       3.9 Low-Reynolds Numbers: Linearized Creeping Motion; 4.1
             Introduction
         4.2 Laminar Boundary-Layer Equations; 4.3 Integral
             (Control Volume approach) and Differential Approach;
         4.4 Similarity Solutions for Boundary-Layer Equations
16       第三次期中考
17       5.1 Introduction: The Concept of Small-Disturbance
             Stability
         5.2 Linearized Stability of Parallel Viscous Flows
18       流體力學相關專題研究期末報告
scorePolicy:
1. 平時考核10%
2. 第一次期中考：20%
3. 第二次期中考：20%
4. 第三次期中考：20%
5. 流體力學相關專題研究期末報告30%
materials: Viscous Fluid Flow (3rd Edition, McGraw-Hill), by Frank M. White
